pr_title: Implement HTTP Response status code metrics reporting for REST API

timeline.bodyText: This is info now but I think we should change it to debug or just removing it. Leaving it here for the moment until more iteration is done to the PR

replies.bodyText: Agreed - should be either debug or trace level.

replies.bodyText: After thinking about this more, let's delete this. :) I think it is redundant since we have logging enabled (via annotation) for all the REST implementation classes.
